"Ever-Changing Automata":
"Oh, dude, I saw the most incredible automata! Have
you seen it yet? You know, that transforming bad boy
down in the Underworks? It's called a Tranmizer! It's
so cool! Kind of like the toys I played with as a kid,
but this one's no toy! It's downright deadly! And it's
crazy powerful. Of course I could handle it with one
hand tied behind my back. Probably too tough for
you though, but why don't you give it a try just to see?

*Target: Hostiles level 21 or higher"

"すっげえ、すっげえの見たぜ、おい！
おたくは見たか？　あの地下坑道にいる
変形する機甲種！　トランマイザー！
いいよなぁ、変形はロマンだ……！
って、そうじゃねえよ、あいつやべえ！
フツーにめちゃくちゃ強ええから！
まあ、オレぐらいなら素手でも余裕だけど
さすがにおたくはキビシイっしょ？
ちょっと戦ってきてみたらどうよ？
※Lv.21～のエネミーが対象"
